name: Grandma's Day Pass
description:
Playing as a Grandma in a nursing home while seeking adventure, you must sneak out to the home before the security catches you. Be stealthy, turn off cameras and defend yourself as you head out to the big world.

**DEV NOTE**

This game was a personal project to push me out of my comfort zone and allowed me to experiment with multiple mechanics. It's not perfect, but I plan to return to this game in future to make improvements.

If you try the game... THANK YOU <3

If you encounter any bugs or crashes, please get in touch with me here. https://gamesbymon.weebly.com/contact.html
